Actions.Text: REFERRED TO MENTAL HEALTH AND DEVELOPMENTAL DISABILITIES

Title: Relates to ensuring that the offices of mental health and people with developmental disabilities provide materials to individuals in different languages
Summary: Ensures that the office of mental health and the office for people with developmental disabilities provide materials to individuals in English and the top six languages spoken in the state.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to ensuring that the office of mental health and the office for people with developmental disabilities provide materials to individuals in different languages
